Name: BomberGuys
About the game: ðŸ’£ BomberGuys is a top-down multiplayer game with simple controls. In fact, apart from movement, the player only has one ability: placing bombs. Each bomb explodes in four directions, the explosion can destroy enemies or destroy brick blocks. In the blocks you can find bonuses that increase the range of the explosion, you can place additional bombs or increase the speed of your character. The goal of each player is to destroy all enemies and remain alone on the field. LEVEL EDITOR Create and play with your friends on your own maps with your own rules. CO-OP \ MULTIPLAYER Join the game or create your own with your friends. ENDLESS FUN Thanks to your support and suggestions, we try to do the best for you.
